Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 4th overall pick, by Houston in 1988...
Had first career hit (double) on 4/3/1992, off Andy McGaffigan (STL)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/12/1992, off Lee Guetterman (CHC)...
Injured on 9/19/1992 with a Pulled Anterior Cruciate Ligament, out for 5-6 weeks...
Traded from Houston to Pittsburgh on 1/31/1993 (Going to HOU: 1B E. Martinez, P M. Perez, SS B. Larkin. Going to PIT: SS J. Valentin, 3B N. Nakamura, 1B A. Cabrera)...
Drove in 7 runs against Chicago (N) on 6/22/1994...
Won Player of the Week award on 8/25/1994, hitting .524 with 2 HR, 6 RBI...
Injured on 5/5/1995 with a Strained Tricep Muscle, out for 5-6 weeks...
Won World Series with Pittsburgh in 1996...
Had 5 hits with 4 RBI against Los Angeles on 8/11/1997...
Won World Series with Pittsburgh in 1997...
Won Player of the Week award on 7/14/1998, hitting .542 with 3 HR, 7 RBI...
